comments.comment: Wadikal mea aanduwa pawathinne naha. Paw kaarayanta marena mohothedhi meawata wandhi gewanna sidha wenawa. Pasku iridha thrastha prahara walata waga kiwa yuthu gotabaya cardinal thumata kiyanawa suwadhina commission ekak path karala hoyanawalu. Cardinal thumath dhannawa kaudha meake pitipasse inna bawa ethuma dhannawa. Meatharam horakam karapu ayadha yalith warak paminiye janadhipathi tharangayen jaya laba.  Ape janathaawa ay meatharam moada waradhi karapuwa aya gana karattuwa dhana dhanath ohuwama path kale. Agamathith Rajapaksa pawlema Mahindhawa yalith agamathi washayen dhiwrum dhunna. Sajith Premadasa mahathmaya Nayakathwayata path kala yuthuwa thibilath ohuge wada satahan gana thibuna hondhama prathpathi prakashanaya koi tharam janathawata sahanayak labenna thibuna, namuth samaharun ohuta chandhaya nodhi paraajaya kala. Ara dhuppath pawlwalata sahana rasak genawa ppasal yana dhuppath dharuwanta nila adhum kattala dekak ha sapaththu kuttamak dhiwa aahaarayak dhenawa kiwwa, pohora nomile govinta dhenawa kiwwa.namuth kawruth ohuta kan dhunne naha. Idhiriyedhi therai ohuge watina kama mole aththanta.
comments.author: Mohammed Muzaahir
